sqlMap.select:
SELECT 1 FROM PTP WHERE RELATED_NE_CUID IN
#ptpsList[]#
sqlMap.update: update ptp p set p.port_state = '1' where p.cuid = (select nvl(ao.related_upne_port_cuid, ao.related_pos_port_cuid) from an_onu ao where ao.cuid = #cuid#)
update ptp p set p.port_state = #portState# where p.cuid = #cuid#
sqlMap.select: SELECT CUID,LABEL_CN FROM DEVICE_VENDOR WHERE CUID=(SELECT VENDOR_NAME FROM NE_MODEL_CFG_TYPE WHERE CUID=#CUID#)

SELECT A.CUID, A.LABEL_CN, A.DEV_IP, (SELECT T.LABEL_CN FROM AN_POS T WHERE T.CUID = A.RELATED_POS_CUID) AS N_RELATED_POS_CUID, A.RELATED_POS_CUID, (SELECT P.LABEL_CN FROM PTP P WHERE P.CUID = A.RELATED_POS_PORT_CUID) AS N_RELATED_POS_PORT_CUID, A.RELATED_POS_PORT_CUID, (SELECT D.LABEL_CN FROM DISTRICT D WHERE D.CUID = A.RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID) AS N_RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID, A.RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID, CASE WHEN A.RELATED_ROOM_CUID IS NOT NULL AND A.RELATED_ROOM_CUID != ' ' THEN A.RELATED_ROOM_CUID WHEN A.RELATED_ACCESS_POINT IS NOT NULL AND A.RELATED_ACCESS_POINT != ' ' THEN A.RELATED_ACCESS_POINT END RELATED_SPACE_CUID, CASE WHEN A.RELATED_ROOM_CUID IS NOT NULL AND A.RELATED_ROOM_CUID != ' ' THEN (SELECT R.LABEL_CN AS NAME FROM ROOM R WHERE R.CUID = A.RELATED_ROOM_CUID) WHEN A.RELATED_ACCESS_POINT IS NOT NULL AND A.RELATED_ACCESS_POINT != ' ' THEN (SELECT AP.LABEL_CN FROM ACCESSPOINT AP WHERE AP.CUID = A.RELATED_ACCESS_POINT) END N_RELATED_SPACE_CUID, (SELECT T.LABEL_CN FROM NMS_SYSTEM T WHERE T.CUID = A.RELATED_EMS_CUID) AS N_RELATED_EMS_CUID, A.RELATED_EMS_CUID, (SELECT D.LABEL_CN FROM DEVICE_VENDOR D WHERE D.CUID = A.RELATED_VENDOR_CUID) AS N_RELATED_VENDOR_CUID, A.RELATED_VENDOR_CUID, (SELECT F.PRODUCT_MODEL FROM NE_MODEL_CFG_TYPE F WHERE F.SIGNAL_TYPE = 9 AND F.CUID = A.MODEL) AS N_MODEL, A.MODEL, (SELECT T.LABEL_CN FROM TRANS_ELEMENT T WHERE T.CUID = A.RELATED_OLT_CUID) AS N_RELATED_OLT_CUID, A.RELATED_OLT_CUID, (SELECT T.LABEL_CN FROM PTP T WHERE T.CUID = A.RELATED_OLT_PORT_CUID) AS N_RELATED_OLT_PORT_CUID, A.RELATED_OLT_PORT_CUID, A.NATIVE_EMS_NAME, A.SEQNO, A.HARD_VERSION, A.SOFT_VERSION, A.SETUP_TIME, A.REAL_LONGITUDE, A.OWNERSHIP_MAN, A.LATITUDE, A.REAL_LATITUDE, A.LONGITUDE, A.REMARK, A.AUTH_TYPE, A.MAC_ADDR, A.PASSWORD, A.LOGICID, A.ONU_ID, A.FTTX, A.ONU_TYPE, A.RELATED_TEMPLATE_NAME, A.RELATED_PROJECT_CUID, A.LAST_MODIFY_USER, A.CREATOR_NAME, A.OWNERSHIP, A.PORT_NUMBER, A.MAINT_PERSON, A.DATA_QUALITY_PERSON, A.MAINT_MODE, A.ACCESS_TYPE, A.LOCATION, A.STANDARD_NAME, A.RELATED_ACCESS_POINT, A.PRESERVER, A.CREATE_TIME, A.LIVE_CYCLE FROM AN_ONU A WHERE CUID = #CUID#

SELECT SUBSTR(RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID, 0, 26) AS RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID FROM FIBER_CAB_GX WHERE CUID = #CUID# UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID, 0, 26) AS RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID FROM FIBER_DP_GX WHERE CUID = #CUID#
sqlMap.update: update card c set c.label_cn = ((select labeL_cn from an_onu ap where ap.cuid = c.related_device_cuid) || '-' || substr(fdn, instr(fdn, 'slot=') + 5, instr(fdn, ':Equipment=1') - instr(fdn, 'slot=') - 5) || '-' || nvl(trim(c.component_name), 'VBoard')) where c.related_device_cuid = #CUID#
update ptp p set p.label_cn = ((select labeL_cn from card c where c.cuid = p.related_card_cuid) || '-' || lpad(p.port_no, 2, 0)) where p.related_ne_cuid = #CUID#
sqlMap.select: select ao.label_cn from an_onu ao where ao.related_pos_port_cuid = #CUID# union all select ap.label_cn from an_pos ap where ap.related_upne_port_cuid = #CUID#

SELECT 'PTP' AS BM_CLASS_ID, CASE WHEN P.DEV_TYPE = 1 THEN ( SELECT LABEL_CN FROM TRANS_ELEMENT WHERE CUID = P.RELATED_NE_CUID ) WHEN P.DEV_TYPE = 2 THEN ( SELECT LABEL_CN FROM AN_ONU WHERE CUID = P.RELATED_NE_CUID ) WHEN P.DEV_TYPE = 3 THEN ( SELECT LABEL_CN FROM AN_POS WHERE CUID = P.RELATED_NE_CUID ) END N_RELATED_NE_CUID, P.RELATED_NE_CUID, CASE WHEN P.DEV_TYPE = 1 THEN (SELECT (SELECT D.LABEL_CN AS NAME FROM DISTRICT D WHERE D.CUID = TE.RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID) FROM TRANS_ELEMENT TE WHERE TE.CUID = P.RELATED_NE_CUID) WHEN P.DEV_TYPE = 2 THEN (SELECT (SELECT D.LABEL_CN AS NAME FROM DISTRICT D WHERE D.CUID = AO.RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID) FROM AN_ONU AO WHERE AO.CUID = P.RELATED_NE_CUID) WHEN P.DEV_TYPE = 3 THEN (SELECT (SELECT D.LABEL_CN AS NAME FROM DISTRICT D WHERE D.CUID = AP.RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID) FROM AN_POS AP WHERE AP.CUID = P.RELATED_NE_CUID) END N_RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID, P.CUID,P.LABEL_CN,P.PORT_TYPE,P.PORT_SUB_TYPE,P.PORT_NO,P.PORT_STATE,P.VLAN,P.PORT_RATE,P.REMARK, (SELECT C.LABEL_CN FROM CARD C WHERE C.CUID = P.RELATED_CARD_CUID) AS N_RELATED_CARD_CUID,P.RELATED_CARD_CUID, (SELECT C.FDN FROM CARD C WHERE C.CUID = P.RELATED_CARD_CUID) AS N_FDN, (select C.CARDTYPE_NAME FROM CARD_KIND C, CARD D WHERE D.MODEL=C.CUID AND D.CUID = P.RELATED_CARD_CUID) AS N_CARD_KIND_CUID FROM PTP P WHERE P.CUID = #CUID#

SELECT P.CUID,P.LABEL_CN,P.PORT_TYPE,P.PORT_NO,P.PORT_SUB_TYPE,P.OPERATING_STATE,P.REMARK, (SELECT C.LABEL_CN FROM CARD C WHERE C.CUID = P.RELATED_CARD_CUID) AS N_RELATED_CARD_CUID,P.RELATED_CARD_CUID, (SELECT N.LABEL_CN FROM NMS_SYSTEM N WHERE N.CUID = P.RELATED_EMS_CUID) AS N_RELATED_EMS_CUID,P.RELATED_EMS_CUID, (SELECT T.LABEL_CN FROM TRANS_ELEMENT T WHERE T.CUID = P.RELATED_NE_CUID UNION SELECT O.LABEL_CN FROM AN_ONU O WHERE O.CUID = P.RELATED_NE_CUID UNION SELECT A.LABEL_CN FROM AN_POS A WHERE A.CUID = P.RELATED_NE_CUID) AS N_RELATED_NE_CUID,P.RELATED_NE_CUID,PORT_RATE,VLAN,PORT_STATE FROM PTP P WHERE P.CUID = #CUID#
